text: AskMe or Ask Me may refer to: * Ask Me, a TV series that airs on Treehouse TV and Qubo. * Ask MetaFilter (short: AskMe), a subsite of community weblog MetaFilter * AskMeNow, an American public corporation specializing in mobile search and advertising * "Ask Me" (Elvis Presley song), a 1964 song by Elvis Presley * "Ask Me", a song on the Amy Grant album Heart in Motion * A.S.K. M.E., an American musical trio * The AskMe EPSS, initially developed for health care in The Netherlands
title: AskMe
